scripts.build:dev: npm run build && vite build --mode development
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && vite build --mode production
scripts.build:webpack:prod: npm run build && webpack  --config webpack.config.production.js --mode production
scripts.build:webpack:prod:copy: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.config.production.js --mode production && cp dist/procaptcha_bundle.*.bundle.js ../../demos/client-bundle-example/src
scripts.build:webpack:dev: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.config.development.js --mode development --watch
scripts.build:webpack:dev:copy: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.config.development.js --mode development --watch
